
## Rollcall vote data for Delaware State Legislature {.unnumbered}


### Description

This data frame contains the rollcall voting data for the Delaware state legislature from 1995 to present.
The data is in long format so that each row is one vote cast by a legislator. It includes a column, 
'group_id', that lists a party for each legislator (D=Democrat, R=Republican,X=Independent).



### Usage

<pre><code class='language-R'>delaware
</code></pre>


### Format

A long data frame with one row for every vote cast by a legislator.



### Details

The original data come from Boris Shor and Nolan McCarty (2002), &quot;The Ideological Mapping of 
American Legislatures&quot;, American Political Science Review.

<a href="https://www.cambridge.org/core/journals/american-political-science-review/article/ideological-mapping-of-american-legislatures/8E1192C22AA0B9F9B56167998A41CAB0">https://www.cambridge.org/core/journals/american-political-science-review/article/ideological-mapping-of-american-legislatures/8E1192C22AA0B9F9B56167998A41CAB0</a>
